alert.note: Alert for North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 10:53PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL ITASCA, NORTHWESTERN AITKIN AND EAST CENTRAL CASS COUNTIES THROUGH 1130 PM CDT... At 1053 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Remer, or 20 miles southwest of Grand Rapids, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Swatara around 1110 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hill City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca
